description.short: Large circular neon sign marking the food court entrance
description.long: A suspended circular neon sign reading 'FOOD COURT' with distinctive blue arc surrounding red text. Mounted under the tensile roof canopy, visible from the upper level. Serves as the primary visual landmark for food court navigation. The sign's glow creates a portal-like effect when viewed from the escalator descent sequence.
